item.title: Ansible
item.description: Concept 功能：IT automation tool. It can configure systems, deploy software, and orchestrate more advanced IT tasks such as continuous deployments or zero downtime rolling updates. 管理方式：push-based Ansible manages machines in an agent-less manner. Ansible by default manages machines over the SSH protocol. Because OpenSSH is one of the most peer-reviewed open source components, security exposure is greatly reduced. Requirement Control Machine: SSH client and Linux system Managed Node: Python 2.
